general_info.summary: The author expresses great pleasure in being a part of Sharda University, highlighting it as a great institution with an innovative approach to learning. They also commend the helpfulness of the faculty and staff, and the overall great atmosphere with high standards.
general_info.raw_content: It is a great pleasure being a part of Sharda University. Its a great institution with innovative approach of learning. The faculty members and staff are always helpful. Atmosphere is great over here with high standards
